alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:18AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Franklin County through 1000 AM EDT... At 917 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Covington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Covington, Bombay, Burke, Chateaugay, Constable, Earlville, Westville Center, Fort Covington Center, South Bombay, Burke Center, and North Burke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
